categories: Category:Articles known by rank or affiliation

nodes.text: The Bartokk Queen was a Bartokk female leader of the Bartokk chapter of the Assassin's Guild shortly before the Invasion of Naboo in the final decades of the Galactic Republic. She was hired by Groodo the Hutt to destroy the Corulag Academy. The Bartokk Queen was killed on Corulag by the Jedi Grand Master Yoda while she was trying to escape the planet aboard her stolen Sullustan space yacht.
